page.title: 05PENSIONERS
page.content: Mr. and Mrs. K. are old-age pensioners. They have lived in Hornchurch for a long time. In the 1930s there were few roads and a lot of fields. They bought the land behind Dorian Road in 1938 and sold it in 1983. When they first came here there were small shops in place of Sainsbury's supermarket. They also remember the old fire station in Billet Lane. Mr. K. used to cycle miles along country roads every day just to get to work. When they first moved to this area they could walk in a straight line from Dorian Road to Elm Park. Now it is a built up area They used to cultivate vegetables in 130 feet of land. Now that they do not own the land behind their house they rent an allotment behind our school.
